name: Smoked Paneer Tikka
description: Char-grilled cottage cheese, hung curd, mustard oil, and house spice blend, served with mint chutney.

name: Kolkata Chilli Chicken
description: Crispy chicken tossed with peppers, onions, and a smoky Indo-Chinese chilli sauce.

name: Riverfront Fish Curry
description: Fresh catch simmered in mustard, green chilli, and tomato gravy. Best enjoyed with steamed rice.

name: Smoked Dal Makhani
description: Slow-cooked black lentils finished with cream, butter, and a hint of coal smoke.

name: Gur Rasgulla Cheesecake
description: Baked cheesecake with nolen gur, soft rasgulla, and pistachio praline.

name: Masala Chaas
description: Buttermilk tempered with roasted cumin, coriander, and curry leaves.
